FinServ_AssetsAndLiabilities__c.name: FinServ_AssetsAndLiabilities__c
FinServ_AssetsAndLiabilities__c.description: Represents assets or liabilities that are not represented in a client's financial accounts, such as real estate or collectibles.

Amount__c.description: Amount of an asset (positive) or liability (negative).

AssetsAndLiabilitiesSource__c.description: Data source. Label is Source. Valid values: Manual Entry Yodlee

AssetsAndLiabilitiesType__c.description: Type of asset or liability. Label is Type. Valid values: Auto Loan Mortgage Other Personal Loan Real Estate Equipment Automobile Collection Gold Jewelry Cash

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

Description__c.description: Description of this asset or liability.

FinancialAccount__c.description: Financial account that this asset or liability is related to.

Household__c.description: Household that this asset or liability is associated with.

JointOwner__c.description: Joint owner, if any, for this asset or liability.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of this asset or liability.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the asset or liability record.

Ownership__c.description: Type of ownership for this asset or liability. Valid values: Individual Joint Trust

OwnerType__c.description: Clientâ€™s ownership role (primary or joint) for this asset or liability. The value is specified by a trigger.

PrimaryOwner__c.description: Primary owner of this asset or liability.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type associated with this asset or liability.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the asset or liability in an external data source.
